https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Aj3Vw5wri0AqIHXJCBQ0DHnpTzj.jpg In present day Spain, between the fixed races at the greyhound track, in a world of outsiders, a love triangle begins between Perla, Fabio and Lillo. A thriller about stolen money pulls us through this story about our three characters learning to start again. Bestezuelas
